alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 6:21PM EDT until May 09 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 300 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of Duck Creek and it`s tributaries is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 620 PM EDT, Gauge reports indicate that Duck Creek and it`s tributaries are flooding. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Cat Creek, West Fork Duck Creek, Bear Creek, Right Branch Cat Creek, Pawpaw Creek and East Fork Duck Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Macksburg and Lower Salem. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
